query: WITH entities AS (SELECT id FROM core_pending_credit_facilities WHERE (COALESCE(id > $2, true)) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $3 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_pending_credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
